skins.shipDescription: Mahan-class destroyer - Downes, Hull Number DD-375!
skins.selfIntroduction: Yahoo! I'm the Mahan-class destroyer Downes! I've had to undergo some pretty serious repairs, and have had to replace half my body! I'm stronger than I ever was now! I promise, you won't be disappointed!
skins.acquisition: Hey! Are you the commander? I'm Downes. Nice meeting you!
skins.login: Yo~! Commander, the wind is nice today. Want to go with me and feed our enemies some torpedoes?
skins.details: Oh? Do you fancy girls with a bit of muscle? Girls like me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Tsk! I'm so bored~ I wanna blow something up!
skins.secretaryIdle2: My magazine's too easy to hit? It's fine, one day or another it'll blow up anyway!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh, Commander, what do you think of the phrase, "I'm only half the person I used to be"? Sounds kinda philosophical, doesn't it?
skins.secretaryTouch: Ah, that's the spot, right there~

skins.shipDescription: Roar! I'm the tiger, Downes! Hehe, Commander, how do you like me now? I feel super fired up right now, so hurry up and let me at 'em!
skins.acquisition: Roar! I'm the tiger, Downes! Hehe, Commander, how do you like me now? I feel super fired up right now, so hurry up and let me at 'em!
skins.login: Yo! Commander, let's work hard today as well! If you get tired, I'll raise your spirits with a bang!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Shall we go light things up on the seas? Well, just when you're free, Commander. I'm not that bored yet~
